mainStyle: transition-all w-full min-h-screen bg-zinc-950 bg-ornament bg-[length:500px]
sectionStyle: w-full min-h-screen p-5 flex flex-col justify-center items-center
rootBoxStyle: w-full max-w-md bg-zinc-950 rounded-xl shadow shadow-xl shadow-zinc-950 flex flex-col border-2 border-zinc-800
headerBorderStyle: scale-[1.017] bg-gradient-to-br from-zinc-400 to-zinc-950 p-[1.5px] rounded-xl hover:-translate-y-1
headerStyle: w-full rounded-xl p-4 bg-zinc-900 flex flex-col
headerTitleStyle: flex items-center gap-2 text-xl font-bold text-zinc-300
formStyle: p-4 mt-3 w-full flex flex-col gap-4
inputNameStyle: name peer w-full bg-zinc-950 outline-0 text-lg font-normal text-zinc-200 tracking-wider rounded-xl px-4 py-2 border-4 border-zinc-900 placeholder:text-transparent focus:border-zinc-500
inputWAStyle: wa peer w-full bg-zinc-950 outline-0 text-lg font-normal text-zinc-200 tracking-widest rounded-xl px-4 py-2 border-4 border-zinc-900 placeholder:text-transparent focus:border-zinc-500
labelStyle: absolute -translate-y-3 peer-placeholder-shown:translate-y-3 ml-3 text-sm font-normal text-zinc-500 peer-focus:-translate-y-3 bg-zinc-950 w-auto px-2 py-1 peer-focus:text-zinc-300
footerStyle: px-4 text-center w-full text-zinc-400 text-sm mt-2 mb-7 font-normal
buttonStyle: flex gap-2 justify-center items-center py-2 mt-2 w-full text-lg rounded-xl outline-0 font-medium
